name: udemy_compare_courses
description: Compare multiple courses on Udemy by searching and extracting their ratings, prices, student counts, and instructor info side by side.

parameters.name: courses
parameters.description: Comma-separated course names (e.g. 'python bootcamp,javascript course,react complete guide')

detailSteps.code: const first = document.querySelector('[class*="course-card"]:first-child, [data-purpose="course-card-container"]:first-child'); if (!first) return { name: '', instructor: '', rating: '', price: '', url: '' }; const titleEl = first.querySelector('h3, [class*="title"]'); const instructorEl = first.querySelector('[class*="instructor"], [class*="teacher"]'); const ratingEl = first.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [data-purpose="rating-number"]'); const priceEl = first.querySelector('[data-purpose="course-price-text"] span, [class*="price"] span'); const studentsEl = first.querySelector('[class*="enrollment"], [class*="students"]'); const linkEl = first.querySelector('a[href*="/course/"]'); return { name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', instructor: instructorEl ? instructorEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', students: studentsEl ? studentsEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }
detailSteps.name: course_info
detailSteps.label: Extract top result
